name: Global Showdown
description:
"Daddy Nature strikes back, he'll get rid of those pesky polluters and repair the Earth once and for all!" 

In this game, players each try to repair the world in their own way; either through placing beautiful trees, or creating a thriving industry with factories. By using any means nessecary, they'll try to stop their opponent from ruining that beautiful world they so desire! Drop down meteors, freeze oil tankers in their tracks, or turn those awful trees into paper. After one round, the roles and ideals are reversed! 

The game is played by two players, with the game consisting of two rounds. The game can be played with controllers (such as Xbox or PlayStation controllers), one person can also take control using the mouse and the WASD keys.

Controls:

  • WASD/Left control stick - Rotate the camera
  • Cursor/Right control stick - Aim
  • Click/Right trigger/A button - Fire!
  • Q key/E key/Mouse wheel/Shoulder buttons - Cycle through furniture

This game was created during the Global Game Jam of 2020: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/global-showdown-9

Voted as the best game of the Global Game Jam 2020 in Amsterdam: http://amsterjam.org/jamsite/?p=1346
